info.title: Airlabs
info.description: Airlabs collects extensive real-time aviation and flight data from thousands of sources to cleanse, aggregate and organize it into comprehensive collections

parameters.name: flag
parameters.description: Filtering by Airline Country ISO 2 code, e.g.: HU

parameters.name: flight_icao
parameters.description: Filtering by Flight ICAO code-number, e.g.: WZZ252

parameters.name: flight_iata
parameters.description: Filtering by Flight IATA code-number, e.g.: W61681

parameters.description: Filtering by departure Airport ICAO code, e.g.: OTHH

parameters.name: dep_iata
parameters.description: Filtering by departure Airport IATA code, e.g.: DOH

parameters.name: arr_icao
parameters.description: Filtering by arrival Airport ICAO code, e.g.: LHBP

parameters.name: arr_iata
parameters.description: Filtering by arrival Airport IATA code, e.g.: BUD

updated.description: UNIX timestamp of last aircraft signal.
updated.title: Updated

status.description: Current flight status - scheduled, en-route, landed.
status.title: Status

parameters.name: flight_iata
parameters.description: Search by Flight IATA code-number, e.g.: W61681

parameters.name: flight_icao
parameters.description: Search by Flight ICAO code-number, e.g.: WZZ252

engine.description: Aircraft engine type - jet, piston, turboprop/turboshaft, electric.
engine.title: Engine

get.description: List all airlines available in Airlabs DB.

parameters.name: iata_code
parameters.description: Filtering by Airline IATA code, e.g.: AA

parameters.name: iata_prefix
parameters.description: Filtering by IATA prefix number, e.g. 1

parameters.name: iata_accounting
parameters.description: Filtering by IATA accounting number, e.g.: 1

parameters.name: icao_code
parameters.description: Filtering by Airline ICAO code, e.g.: AAL

parameters.name: callsign
parameters.description: Filtering by ICAO callsign, e.g.: AMERICAN

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Filtering by Country ISO 2 code, e.g.: US

parameters.name: _fields
parameters.description: Fields to return (comma separated, e.g.: name,iata_code,icao_code)

iata_prefix.description: 3 Numeric Airline Prefix Code for Cargo Operations​.
iata_prefix.title: IATA prefix

iata_accounting.description: 3 Numeric Accounting Code for Passenger Operations.
iata_accounting.title: IATA accounting

accidents_last_5y.description: Airline accidents for the last 5 years.
accidents_last_5y.title: Last 5 years - accidents

crashes_last_5y.description: Airline crashes for the last 5 years.
crashes_last_5y.title: Last 5 years - crashes

slug.description: AirLabs generated uniq Airline ID, which you can use for SEO, etc.
slug.title: Slug

get.description: List all routes tracked by Airlabs DB.

parameters.name: dep_iata
parameters.description: Filtering by departure Airport IATA code, e.g.: BLR

parameters.name: dep_icao
parameters.description: Filtering by departure Airport ICAO code, e.g. VOBL

parameters.name: arr_iata
parameters.description: Filtering by arrival Airport IATA code, e.g.: CMB

parameters.description: Filtering by Airline IATA code, e.g.: UL

parameters.name: flight_icao
parameters.description: Filtering by Flight ICAO code-number, e.g.: ALK172

parameters.name: flight_iata
parameters.description: Filtering by Flight IATA code-number, e.g.: UL172

parameters.name: _fields
parameters.description: Fields to return (comma separated, e.g.: airline_iata,flight_number)

dep_time.description: Departure time in the airport time zone.
dep_time.title: Departure time

dep_time_utc.description: Departure time in UTC time zone.
dep_time_utc.title: Departure time (UTC)

arr_terminals.description: A list of possible arrival terminals.
arr_terminals.title: Arrival terminals

arr_time.description: Time of arrival in the airport time zone.
arr_time.title: Arrival time

arr_time_utc.description: Time of arrival in the UTC time zone.
arr_time_utc.title: Arrival time (UTC)

days.description: Flight departure days - sun, mon, tue, wed, thu, fri, sat.
days.title: Days

get.description: List all airports tracked by Airlabs DB.

parameters.name: iata_code
parameters.description: Filtering by Airport IATA code, e.g.: CDG

parameters.name: icao_code
parameters.description: Filtering by Airport ICAO code, e.g.: LFPG

parameters.name: city_code
parameters.description: Filtering by IATA City code, e.g.: PAR

parameters.name: country_code
parameters.description: Filtering by Country ISO 2 code, e.g.: FR

parameters.name: _fields
parameters.description: Fields to return (comma separated, e.g.: name,iata_code,icao_code,lat,lng)

departures.description: Total departures from airport per year.
departures.title: Departures

is_major.description: The major airport in metropolitan area.
is_major.title: Is major?

get.description: List all countries available and tracked by Airlabs DB.

parameters.description: Filtering by Country ISO 2 code, e.g.: US

parameters.name: code3
parameters.description: Filtering by Country ISO 3 code, e.g.: USA

parameters.name: continent
parameters.description: Filtering by continent code - AF, AN, AS, EU, NA, OC, SA

parameters.name: _fields
parameters.description: Fields to return (comma separated, e.g.: name,code,code3,currency)

continent.description: Continent code - AF, AN, AS, EU, NA, OC, SA.
continent.title: Continent
